description: Essential oils can support healing and relaxation. The Graf Center for Integrative Medicine offers aromatherapy workshops, demos, and products.
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Essential oils can support healing and relaxation. The Graf Center for Integrative Medicine is a great way to learn more about these benefits. Our aromatherapy offerings include: Workshops and Demonstrations We host these programs two or three times a year, but the schedule varies. Check our [calendar of events](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=graf-center-for-integrative-medicine) to find out about upcoming aromatherapy programs. Aromatherapy with Massage You can add aromatherapy to any private [massage therapy](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/massage-therapy) session for just $5 more.
